text: Paulo Manuel Neves Alves (born 25 Desember 1997), commonly known as Paulinho, is a Portuguese footballer who plays for A.D. Sanjoanense as a midfielder. ==Football career== He made his professional debut for 1. FK Příbram on 30 September 2019 in the Czech First League. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Portuguese expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:Czech First League players Category:A.D. title: Paulinho (footballer, born December 1997)
